vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_19.sol#12-19):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)()) (patch_19.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_19.sol#17)
	- lastWithdrawTime (patch_19.sol#18)
